title: Born Wicked
description: Jayme-Lynn Price is an outcast. The kids at school all avoid her –ordered by Julian Cross, prince of Salem High. One boy, one day, one kiss and Jayme-Lynn is faced with the truth about who she really is… and what she can really do. Secrets her dead parents swore to keep, honored by her Gran, Jayme-Lynn learns that the faces of betrayal are on the people who are closest to her. Her world is suddenly filled with magic, unraveling lies and the Guild –a secret order of Witch Hunters determined to kill her if she makes one wrong move. Julian, the enemy she’s always known, now the only one she can turn to for help; and Ethan, the boy who changed her whole life and stole her heart are the only ones she can trust. But when she discovers he too has a hidden past kept secret by his family, Ethan has to choose: Honor his legacy, fulfill his destiny, and forever lose the girl he loves? Or turn his back on who he really is and risk it all, including his life, for her…
author: Elden Dare
